module.sqlWrap: SELECT v.RoomId,v.Title,v.Banner,v.LiveTime,v.EndTime,v.CreatedTime,v.LiveId,v.LiveNumber,v.RoomId FROM Vedio v WHERE (GETDATE() BETWEEN GETDATE() AND v.EndTime) AND v.Status = 1 ORDER BY v.LiveTime ASC
SELECT TOP (@Top) v.VedioId,v.Title,v.Banner,v.LiveTime FROM Vedio v WHERE (v.LiveTime BETWEEN GETDATE() AND v.LiveTime) AND v.Status = 1 ORDER BY v.LiveTime ASC

SELECT TOP (@Top) VedioId,v.RoomId,Title,v.Banner,c.CircleId,c.CircleName,VedioFileUrl,VedioFileUrl_High,LiveTime,EndTime, v.LiveNumber, (SELECT ViewCount FROM VedioViewCount WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS ViewCount FROM Vedio v INNER JOIN Circle c ON c.CircleId = v.CircleId WHERE (GETDATE() BETWEEN LiveTime AND Getdate()) AND v.Status = 1 AND VedioFileUrl != (CASE WHEN GETDATE() BETWEEN LiveTime AND EndTime THEN 'VedioFileUrl' ELSE '' END) ORDER BY LiveTime DESC

SELECT TOP (@Top) v.VedioId,v.Title,v.Banner,v.LiveTime,v.LiveNumber,v.RoomId FROM Vedio v WHERE (v.LiveTime BETWEEN GETDATE() AND v.LiveTime) AND v.Status = 1 AND v.CircleId = @CircleId ORDER BY v.LiveTime ASC

SELECT TOP (@Top) VedioId,v.RoomId,Title,v.Banner,c.CircleId,c.CircleName,VedioFileUrl,VedioFileUrl_High,LiveTime,EndTime, (SELECT ViewCount FROM VedioViewCount WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS ViewCount,v.LiveNumber FROM Vedio v INNER JOIN Circle c ON c.CircleId = v.CircleId WHERE (GETDATE() BETWEEN LiveTime AND Getdate()) AND v.Status = 1 AND VedioFileUrl != (CASE WHEN GETDATE() BETWEEN LiveTime AND EndTime THEN 'VedioFileUrl' ELSE '' END) AND v.CircleId = @CircleId ORDER BY LiveTime DESC

SELECT TOP (@Top) lv.LiveVedioId,lv.VedioId,v.RoomId,v.LiveNumber,lv.LastViewTime AS ViewTime,v.VedioFileUrl,v.VedioFileUrl_High,v.Title,v.Banner,v.LiveTime,v.EndTime,c.CircleId,c.Logo AS CircleLogo,c.CircleName, (SELECT ViewCount FROM VedioViewCount WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS ViewCount, (SELECT COUNT(CommentId) FROM VedioComment WHERE VedioId = lv.VedioId) AS CommentCount FROM LiveVedio lv INNER JOIN Vedio v ON lv.VedioId = v.VedioId INNER JOIN Circle c ON v.CircleId = c.CircleId WHERE lv.PassportId = @PassportId AND v.Status = 1 AND lv.Status = 1 ORDER BY lv.LastViewTime DESC

SELECT * FROM( SELECT TOP (@Top) v.VedioId,v.Title,v.Banner,v.VedioFileUrl,v.VedioFileUrl_High,v.LiveTime,v.EndTime,c.CircleId,c.Logo AS CircleLogo,c.CircleName, (SELECT ViewCount FROM VedioViewCount WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS ViewCount, (SELECT COUNT(CommentId) FROM VedioComment WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS CommentCount,v.RoomId,v.LiveNumber FROM Vedio v INNER JOIN Circle c ON c.CircleId = v.CircleId WHERE (GETDATE() BETWEEN EndTime AND GETDATE()) AND v.Status = 1 and (v.VedioId not in(@VedioId)) AND v.VedioFileUrl IS NOT NULL AND v.VedioFileUrl != '' ORDER BY NEWID() ) t ORDER BY LiveTime DESC

SELECT TOP(1) v.VedioId,VedioFileUrl,v.Title,v.Summary,v.Banner,v.LiveTime,v.LiveId,v.VedioFileUrl_High,v.CircleId,c.CircleName,c.Logo AS CircleLogo,c.FollowedCount, (SELECT StarCareer FROM Star WHERE StarId = c.StarId) AS StarCareer, (SELECT ViewCount FROM VedioViewCount WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS ViewCount, (SELECT COUNT(BeSpeakId) FROM BeSpeakVedio WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS BeSpeakCount, (SELECT COUNT(CommentId) FROM VedioComment WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS CommentCount,v.RoomId,v.LiveNumber FROM Vedio v INNER JOIN Circle c ON v.CircleId = c.CircleId WHERE VedioId = @VedioId AND v.Status = 1

SELECT TOP(1) v.VedioId,v.VedioFileUrl,v.VedioFileUrl_High,v.Title,v.Summary,v.Banner,v.LiveTime, v.CircleId,c.CircleName,c.Logo AS CircleLogo,c.FollowedCount, (SELECT StarCareer FROM Star WHERE StarId = c.StarId) AS StarCareer, (SELECT ViewCount FROM VedioViewCount WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS ViewCount, (SELECT COUNT(CommentId) FROM VedioComment WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS CommentCount, (SELECT COUNT(LikedId) FROM VedioLiked WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS LikedCount,v.RoomId,v.LiveNumber FROM Vedio v INNER JOIN Circle c ON v.CircleId = c.CircleId WHERE VedioId = @VedioId AND v.Status = 1

SELECT TOP(1) v.VedioId,v.Title,v.Summary,v.Banner,v.LiveTime,v.EndTime, (SELECT CreatedTime FROM BeSpeakVedio WHERE VedioId = @VedioId AND PassportId = @PassportId) AS BeSpeakTime, v.CircleId,c.CircleName,c.Logo AS CircleLogo,c.FollowedCount, (SELECT StarCareer FROM Star WHERE StarId = c.StarId) AS StarCareer, (SELECT ViewCount FROM VedioViewCount WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS ViewCount, (SELECT COUNT(BeSpeakId) FROM BeSpeakVedio WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS BeSpeakCount, (SELECT COUNT(CommentId) FROM VedioComment WHERE VedioId = v.VedioId) AS CommentCount,v.RoomId,v.LiveNumber FROM Vedio v INNER JOIN Circle c ON v.CircleId = c.CircleId WHERE VedioId = @VedioId AND v.Status = 1
